## Teaching Resources

This section provides supplementary materials to support teaching and learning of co-ordinate geometry.

### Available Resources

- [Worksheets](worksheets.qmd): Printable practice exercises
- [Worked Examples](examples.qmd): Step-by-step solutions to common problems
- [References & External Resources](references.qmd): Official NZQA links and helpful websites

## Quick Links

### Online Tools

- [Desmos Graphing Calculator](https://www.desmos.com/calculator): Free online graphing tool [@desmos_calculator]
- [GeoGebra](https://www.geogebra.org/): Interactive geometry software [@geogebra_home]

### Additional Reading

Students seeking extra practice or alternative explanations may benefit from:
- [Khan Academy: Coordinate Plane](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/cc-sixth-grade-math/x0267d782:coordinate-plane) [@khan_coordinate_plane]
- [Math is Fun: Coordinate Geometry](https://www.mathsisfun.com/geometry/coordinate-geometry.html) [@mathisfun_coordinate]
